content.question: Which of the following best exemplifies the use of multifactor authentication to protect an online banking system?

choices.label: When a user resets a password for an online bank account, the user is required to enter the new password twice.
When multiple people have a shared online bank account, they are each required to have their own unique username and password.
After entering a password for an online bank account, a user must also enter a code that is sent to the user’s phone via text message.
An online bank requires users to change their account passwords multiple times per year without using the same password twice.

content.answer: After entering a password for an online bank account, a user must also enter a code that is sent to the user’s phone via text message.
